EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: 0.0, 0.0)  
  Used as the core processing facility for smelting iron ore into iron plates. Initially it processed 10 iron ore with 5 coal to produce 6 iron plates and then smelted an additional batch (15 iron ore with added coal) yielding 9 iron plates.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5)  
  Placed adjacent to the furnace to store the produced iron plates.

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position: -16.0, -51.0)  
  Set up for automated iron ore extraction. Its designated drop position is (-15.5, -49.5) for output.
- Iron Chest (position: -14.5, -49.5)  
  Placed to collect the mining output from the drill after repositioning to better resolve output blockage.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Harvesting Proximity Error  
  – Move the agent within immediate reach of a resource patch before initiating harvesting commands to avoid out-of-range failures.

• Inventory Verification for Placement  
  – Verify that the required entity is present in the inventory prior to placement to prevent placement attempts with missing items.

• Ingredient Dependency Error for Crafting Composite Items  
  – Confirm that all sub-ingredients (for example, ensuring sufficient iron plates) are available or producible before crafting composite items like transport belts.

• Placement Range Error  
  – Ensure the agent is moved closer to the target location before placing an entity; placement errors will occur if the target position is out of the allowed range.

• Output Sink Blockage  
  – When setting up automated mining, position sink entities (such as chests) correctly within the drill’s drop zone to avoid output blockages and associated warnings.
